text:
DeskPRO | London | ONSITE

http://www.deskpro.com

Recruiting Co-lead developer, full stack developers and a front end developer.

Stack is PHP 7, ReactJS, mySQL, Elasticsearch, AWS

We make a helpdesk platform used by millions of people. Come and help us build new channels (voice, twitter, facebook & video-chat).

jobs@deskpro.com or ideally https://deskpro.workable.com/

Friendly office on the river in West London (Putney Bridge).
